channel.title: Post your control scheme
channel.description:
Post-release, Ive noticed throughout the forums people discussing BM's controls and potential issues. Ive decided to post my control scheme, plus my current keyboard and mouse, as suggestions. Quick weapon switch is enabled.
The gamepad helps, but the key suggestions should still be comfortable on a basic keyboard. My mouse scheme requires two side buttons and a mouse wheel, which many gamers usually have nowadays.
To mods: feel free to delete/move post if irrelevant/misplaced. Thanks. ![controls.jpg|690x426](upload://4zJUmU2GmvKLGFwgwBJONLddSIq.jpeg) ![kyb-ideazon-merc 1.jpg|690x500](upload://7zBxnsweVAGgMiZy6RCkPuxzQ1Y.jpeg) ![r7_4.jpg|450x450](upload://zY5YDyC5SmcgBFAF3vICYpnQ4PU.jpeg)
